title: Vincent Van Gogh The Bedroom Mug
description:
Mug developed from Vincent van Gogh’s The Bedroom, 1899, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Waking up in the morning is a lot easier with a good cup of coffee, and our mug featuring Vincent van Gogh's painting The Bedroom will make it taste even better.  A winning combination: durable, practical, and beautiful.

  • Size: 11oz.
  • Dimensions: 3.26 x 3.75 in.
  • Material: Ceramic
  • Dishwasher (top rack) and microwave safe.
